text: Alhaji Aliu Mahama (3 March 1946 - 16 November 2012) was a Ghanaian engineer and politician who was Vice-President of Ghana from 7 January 2001 to 7 January 2009. Mahama died on 16 November 2012 at a hospital in Accra, Ghana from heart failure caused by a stroke, aged 66."Aliu Mahama Is Dead- Korle Bu Confirms" , Expose Ghana, 16 November 2012."Aliu Mahama died of stroke - Kufuor", Citifm Online, 17 November 2012. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Ghana Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Deaths from heart failure
title: Aliu Mahama
